articles.description: Starting with the iOS 16.4 beta, the iPhone has a new "Beta Updates" menu in the Settings app under General → Software Update. This menu will...
articles.content: Starting with the iOS 16.4 beta, the iPhone has a new "Beta Updates" menu in the Settings app under General Software Update. This menu will allow members of Apple's Developer Program to enable iOS de… [+1774 chars]
